2025-11-07.title: Gurnee Town Hall Meeting
2025-11-07.description: Local officials will discuss upcoming projects and community issues at the Gurnee Village Hall. Public is invited to attend.

2025-11-06.title: Traffic Accident on Route 41
2025-11-06.description: A multi-vehicle accident occurred on Route 41 near Gurnee, causing significant traffic delays. Police are investigating.

2025-11-06.title: Gurnee City Council Meeting
2025-11-06.description: The Gurnee City Council will discuss upcoming budget proposals and community development projects.

2025-11-06.title: New Coffee Shop Opening
2025-11-06.description: A new local coffee shop, Brew & Co., is set to open its doors in downtown Gurnee, offering specialty drinks and pastries.

2025-11-06.title: Expansion of Gurnee Industrial Park
2025-11-06.description: The Gurnee Industrial Park is undergoing an expansion to accommodate new manufacturing facilities, expected to create over 100 jobs.

2025-11-05.title: Gurnee Town Hall Meeting
2025-11-05.description: Local officials will discuss upcoming projects and community concerns at the Gurnee Village Hall.

2025-11-05.title: New Coffee Shop Opening
2025-11-05.description: A new artisan coffee shop, Brew & Co., is opening its doors on Grand Avenue, offering specialty drinks and pastries.

2025-11-05.title: Expansion at Gurnee Industrial Park
2025-11-05.description: A local manufacturing company announced plans to expand its facilities at Gurnee Industrial Park, creating new jobs.

2025-11-04.description: Local officials will discuss upcoming projects and community concerns at the Gurnee Village Hall.

2025-11-04.title: Grand Opening of Gurnee Tech Hub
2025-11-04.description: Celebrate the opening of a new technology hub in Gurnee, featuring tours, networking, and a ribbon-cutting ceremony.

2025-11-03.title: Gurnee City Council Meeting
2025-11-03.description: The Gurnee City Council will meet to discuss local ordinances and community development plans.

2025-11-03.title: Grand Opening of Gurnee Tech Hub
2025-11-03.description: Celebrate the opening of Gurnee's new technology hub, featuring tours, tech demos, and networking opportunities.

2025-11-02.title: Village of Grayslake — Civic Alerts (News Flash)
2025-11-02.description: CivicAlerts page listing the village's current events, reminders, and community notifications. Residents can review recent and ongoing notices including roadwork, public meetings, and service updates.

2025-11-02.title: Grayslake Central to Present 'Sideways Stories' Production
2025-11-02.description: Grayslake Central High School will be presenting a theatrical production of 'Sideways Stories' as part of their cultural programming. This event showcases student talent and creativity.

2025-11-02.title: Visit Lake County — Regional Events Calendar
2025-11-02.description: Visit Lake County's events calendar aggregates festivals, performances, and seasonal attractions across Lake County. Use this calendar to find upcoming entertainment, family activities, and ticketed events.

2025-11-02.title: Medline Celebrates New Flagship Distribution Center in Grayslake
2025-11-02.description: Medline has opened a new flagship distribution center in Grayslake, enhancing local employment opportunities and supporting the community's economy.

2025-11-02.title: Grayslake Community Garden
2025-11-02.description: The Grayslake Community Garden is a local initiative aimed at promoting gardening and community involvement. Residents are encouraged to participate and grow their own plants in a supportive environment.

2025-11-02.title: Building Pathways: Grayslake D127's Summer Manufacturing Camps
2025-11-02.description: Grayslake D127 is hosting summer manufacturing camps aimed at empowering students and strengthening ties with the local industry. This initiative focuses on education and career readiness.

2025-11-02.title: Grayslake Chamber of Commerce — Events & Business Programming
2025-11-02.description: Grayslake Chamber provides networking, promotional programs, and an events calendar for local businesses and community members. Visit the chamber site for upcoming mixers, expos, and member events.

2025-11-02.title: Governor Pritzker announces Cache Energy expansion in Illinois
2025-11-02.description: State press release: Cache Energy plans an expansion that includes new manufacturing equipment and an on-site production line, emphasizing use of Illinois-based vendors and boosting local workforce opportunities. The announcement highlights state support for manufacturing growth in the region.

2025-11-02.title: SWALCO — Shoes, Shred, and Seeds Partnership with Village of Wauconda
2025-11-02.description: The Solid Waste Agency of Lake County (SWALCO) is partnering with the Village of Wauconda on a Shoes, Shred, and Seeds community recycling event. Check SWALCO for scheduling, drop-off details, and participation instructions.

2025-11-02.title: Grayslake Central Range Development — Project Updates
2025-11-02.description: Village page for the Central Range area outlines ongoing development plans expected to generate significant property tax revenue and economic activity. The project page provides updates on planning, approvals, and anticipated local impacts.

2025-11-02.title: College of Lake County — News & Events (Grayslake Campus)
2025-11-02.description: College of Lake County posts campus news, exhibitions, and upcoming programs at its Grayslake campus and other sites. The news & events page lists academic events, community offerings, and public lectures.

2025-11-02.title: Grayslake Community Grant Program
2025-11-02.description: Ongoing Village of Grayslake program providing public support to local nonprofit organizations delivering services to residents. Application and program details are maintained on the village site for upcoming grant cycles.

2025-11-02.title: Lake County Forest Preserves — Events & Recreation
2025-11-02.description: Lake County Forest Preserves maintains listings of nature programs, facility reservations, and seasonal events across county preserves. Check the site for upcoming guided hikes, educational programs, and outdoor events.

2025-11-02.title: Kristof's Entertainment Center — Ongoing Attractions & Special Events
2025-11-02.description: Kristof's in Round Lake Beach is a family entertainment complex offering go-karts, bowling, mini golf, arcades and regular special events or group packages. The venue lists current promotions and event nights on its site.

2025-11-02.title: Village of Grayslake — News & Trending Topics
2025-11-02.description: Official Village of Grayslake news page with current announcements, community updates, and municipal information. Check the site for rotating alerts, seasonal programs, and upcoming local items.

2025-11-02.title: Wauconda Area Chamber — Community Events Calendar
2025-11-02.description: Local events calendar listing business and community events in the Wauconda area, including expos, park district activities, and seasonal programming. Use the calendar to discover upcoming local happenings and registration info.

2025-11-02.title: Gurnee Fall Festival
2025-11-02.description: Join the community for a day of fun with local vendors, live music, and activities for all ages at Viking Park.

2025-11-02.description: A multi-vehicle accident occurred on Route 41 near Grand Avenue, causing significant delays. Police are investigating.
